title: 11/27/2020 – Hour 3 – The Rise of Sports Gambling. Plus, June Jones!
itunes:title: 11/27/2020 – Hour 3 – The Rise of Sports Gambling. Plus, June Jones!
description:
Jason McIntyre and Rob Parker talk about the rise of sports gambling and make an official bet on the Chiefs / Buccaneers game this weekend! Plus, they speak with former NFL and college football head coach June Jones about the top NFL headlines!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
